movies.title: Fishermanâ€™s Friends
movies.plot: Ten fisherman from Cornwall are signed by Universal Records and achieve a top ten hit with their debut album of Sea Shanties. Based on the true-life story of Cornish folk band, Fisherman's Friends.

events.title: The Fisherman's Friends release their first album under Universal Records
